sql

Class RecordsManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • sql.RecordsManagement

  • public class RecordsManagement
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for creating, preparing and executing different types of queries with database.
    Author:
    Nikola, Viktor

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<ComboBoxItem> cbi
      cbi - array of ComboBoxItems (model for foreign key values)
      java.sql.Connection connection
      connection - attribute for setting connection with database
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> constraints
      constraints - attribute which contains column codes and its real values (sent from @see AddOrModifyDialog)
      java.util.Vector<java.util.Vector<java.lang.Object>> data
      data - processed resultSet data values
      java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> headers
      headers - processed table colum names
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,javax.swing.JComponent> newData
      newData - attribute which contains column codes and JComponent object with its value (sent from @see AddOrModifyDialog)
      java.lang.StringBuilder query
      query - text representation of query statement
      private java.awt.Component[] queryComponents
      Array of components from AdvancedSearchDialog which will carry information about queries, contained in query list.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> queryList
      List of prepared queries from AdvancedSearchDialog.
      private java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> recordImages
      recordImages - array of bites for every single image
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> recordValues
      recordValues - array of strings for every single value from database, except image type
      java.sql.ResultSet resultSet
      resultSet - values returned by executing of some queries
      java.sql.PreparedStatement statement
      statement - query which we execute when we want to work with database
      Table table
      table - attribute which shows with which table in database are we working with
      boolean uspesno
      uspesno - attribute which shows, was there error while query was executing

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RecordsManagement(java.awt.Component[] queryComponents, Table table)
      Constructor used for creating an instance with passing components which contain information about the query from the AdvancedSearchDialog, or any list of supported components: AdvancedSearchComponent, AdvancedSearchLogicalOperator.
      RecordsManagement(Table table, TypesOfActions toa, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,javax.swing.JComponent> newData, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> constraints)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void executeAddRecord()
      Method for preparing, making and executing simple INSERT statement (adding specific values to specific table)
      void executeAdvancedSearchRecords()
      Creates a prepared statement from the elements of the advanced search dialog, populates the prepared statement and executes the query, setting the global class result set.
      void executeGetValuesByFK()
      Method for preparing, making and executing specific SELECT statement.
      void executeModifyRecord()
      Method for preparing, making and executing simple UPDATE statement (modifying specific values to specific table under specific constraints-Primary Keys)
      void executeRemoveRecord()
      Prepare, make and execute remove statement
      void executeSearchAllRecords()
      Method for preparing, creating and executing simple SELECT statement (all values from specific table)
      void executeSearchChildrenByFK()
      Method for preparing, creating and executing specific SELECT statement (specific values from specific table under some constraints) Generating values to children which contains parent's values as Foreign Key.
      void executeSearchSpecificRecord()
      Method for preparing, creating and executing specific SELECT statement (specific values from specific table under some constraints) Generating values for to @see AddOrModifyDialog (ModifyDialog)
      java.util.ArrayList<ComboBoxItem> getCbi()
      Getter for cbi
      java.util.Vector<java.util.Vector<java.lang.Object>> getData()
      Processing resultSet values.
      java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> getHeaders()
      Processing table column names.
      java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> getRecordImages()
      Getter for recordImages
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getRecordValues()
      Getter for recordValues
      void getResultSetValues()
      Method for processing resultSet values and putting them into arrays-recordValues and recordImages

    • Constructor Detail

      • RecordsManagement

        public RecordsManagement(Table table,
                         TypesOfActions toa,
                         java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,javax.swing.JComponent> newData,
                         java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> constraints)
        Constructor. Depending on TypesOfActions passed values calls different type of functions.
        Parameters:
        table - - with which table in database are we working with
        toa - - @see TypesOfActions
        newData - - data which we want to add/modify to/in database
        constraints - - constraints under which are we working (which data we want to update)

      • RecordsManagement

        public RecordsManagement(java.awt.Component[] queryComponents,
                         Table table)
        Constructor used for creating an instance with passing components which contain information about the query from the AdvancedSearchDialog, or any list of supported components: AdvancedSearchComponent, AdvancedSearchLogicalOperator.
        Parameters:
        queryComponents - Array of supported components which contain information about the query
        table - Table model which provides the information about the columns for executing the query

        public void executeModifyRecord()
        Method for preparing, making and executing simple UPDATE statement (modifying specific values to specific table under specific constraints-Primary Keys)

      • executeGetValuesByFK

        public void executeGetValuesByFK()
        Method for preparing, making and executing specific SELECT statement. Getting values for specific foreign key. Creating @see ComboBoxItem objects and adding them to the array.

      • executeSearchChildrenByFK

        public void executeSearchChildrenByFK()
        Method for preparing, creating and executing specific SELECT statement (specific values from specific table under some constraints) Generating values to children which contains parent's values as Foreign Key.

      • executeAdvancedSearchRecords

        public void executeAdvancedSearchRecords()
        Creates a prepared statement from the elements of the advanced search dialog, populates the prepared statement and executes the query, setting the global class result set.
